s1.s1_heading:
If you hate it,
automate it!
s1.s1_paragraph:
At Exelentic, we enhance your company’s efficiency
through automation and AI-powered technology.

s3.s3_item_foundation_text: Exelentic was founded in 2018 by experienced IT experts and business analysts. We focus on sustainable process automation and optimization through technologies like RPA, OCR, Process Mining, and AI.
s3.s3_item_quality_text: As a quality leader in Central Europe, we employ innovative approaches to optimize your processes. Exelentic offers tailored solutions for companies looking to improve their efficiency and scalability.
s3.s3_item_automation_text: Automation brings cost-saving potentials and reduces error rates. With RPA, you relieve your teams from manual tasks, creating more time for strategic activities and saving costs in the long run.

s4.s4_card_tools_text: Comprehensive RPA expertise with UiPath, Automation Anywhere, and SAP IRPA, tailored for your IT and processes.
s4.s4_card_academy_text: Our employees undergo the Exelentic Academy: quality standards and practical training from the start.
s4.s4_card_customer_orientation_text: Flexibility in projects: adjustments and support until the final solution, exactly according to your workflows.

s5.s5_heading_integration: The Power of Automation and AI, United
s5.s5_paragraph_integration: At Exelentic, we combine UiPath's automation capabilities with DruidAI's conversational intelligence to create seamless solutions that optimize workflows and enhance human interactions through advanced AI.
s5.s5_benefit_efficiency_text: Save time and resources by automating repetitive tasks with UiPath.
s5.s5_benefit_natural_interactions_text: Utilize DruidAI for smooth, conversation-based user experiences.
s5.s5_benefit_data_insights_text: Gain valuable analyses on user interactions and process efficiency.
s5.s5_benefit_scalable_solutions_text: Scale solutions that meet your business requirements, supported by Exelentic's expertise.

s6.s6_heading_collaboration_benefits: The Benefits of Collaborating with Us
s6.s6_benefit_improved_efficiency_text: Automation reduces the time spent on tasks and allows your team to focus on more value-added activities.
s6.s6_benefit_cost_saving_text: Automation helps lower operational costs by minimizing manual processes.
s6.s6_benefit_higher_accuracy_text: Automated processes minimize human errors and lead to more consistent results.
s6.s6_benefit_scalability_text: Automation enables your business to grow efficiently while maintaining the same quality of output.
s6.s6_benefit_customization_text: Our solutions are flexible and tailored to the specific needs of your business.
s6.s6_benefit_increased_security_text: Using state-of-the-art technologies, we provide maximum security for your data and processes.

s7.s7_heading_working_method: How We Work for You or Collaboratively
s7.s7_step_project_text: Commission us to develop your RPA landscape in traditional or agile IT projects and seamlessly hand it over to your specialized department.
s7.s7_step_tandem_development_text: Do you have RPA developers in-house? We work alongside you, develop new bots, and expand your RPA knowledge for sustainable success.
s7.s7_step_quality_management_text: Unhappy with the delivery speed of your robots? We are your direct contact for quality management, ensuring robust, long-lasting RPA solutions.
s7.s7_step_full_service_text: Want to utilize RPA without in-house personnel? Our team ensures a stable, maintained, and flexible RPA solution for your company.
s7.s7_step_firefighting_text: We rescue RPA projects that initially failed. With our expertise, we resolve alignment issues and sustainably build out projects.
s7.s7_step_consulting_support_text: Our experienced team offers consulting and support to successfully implement and further develop your automation projects.

s8.s8_job_automation_expert_text: RPA Implementation - from process documentation, through implementation to final acceptance.
s8.s8_job_senior_automation_expert_text: Project management and team leadership - act as a liaison to the client.
s8.s8_job_process_mining_expert_text: Identify automation potentials and prepare processes for RPA.
s8.s8_job_last_text: We are waiting for your proactive application! Send your LinkedIn or Xing profile to HR@exelentic.com.
